languages.text: "Я здесь, чтобы под присмотром техножрецов подлатать локомотив номер три, Дикаря. Этот склочник — мой любимец на всей грузовой магистрали. Раз в пару лет Дикарь свирепеет, закипает котлом и начинает плеваться паром в ремонтников. Угадаете, на кого свалили заботу о нем в таких ситуациях? На инфернуса, конечно, — я делаю самую опасную часть, а потом уступаю место железным умникам. Но это ничего, я люблю Дикаря".

traits.locale_text: "Я здесь, чтобы под присмотром техножрецов подлатать локомотив номер три, Дикаря. Этот склочник — мой любимец на всей грузовой магистрали. Раз в пару лет Дикарь свирепеет, закипает котлом и начинает плеваться паром в ремонтников. Угадаете, на кого свалили заботу о нем в таких ситуациях? На инфернуса конечно — я делаю самую опасную часть, а потом уступаю место железным умникам. Но это ничего, я люблю Дикаря".

languages.text: "I'm here to patch up Savage, locomotive number three, under the Tech-Priests' supervision. That old grump is my personal favourite on the entire freight line. Every couple of years, Savage gets mad: his boiler catches fire and starts spitting steam at the repairmen. Guess who they call to take care of him in these situations. The inferni, of course! And after I've done all the most dangerous work, that's when the iron brains come in. But that's all right. I love Savage."
languages.original_text: "Я здесь, чтобы под присмотром техножрецов подлатать локомотив номер три, Дикаря. Этот склочник — мой любимец на всей грузовой магистрали. На инфернуса, конечно, — я делаю самую опасную часть, а потом уступаю место железным умникам. Но это ничего, я люблю Дикаря".

traits.locale_text: "I am here to patch up Savage, locomotive number three. That squabbler is my personal favourite on the entire freight line. Every couple of years, Savage gets mad, his boiler catches fire and starts spitting steam at the repairmen. Guess who they call to take care of him in these situations? The Infernus, of course. But this is fine, I love Savage."

Once I've done all the most dangerous work, that's when the iron brains come in. But that's all right. I love Savage."

languages.text: «Estoy aquí para darle un repaso a Salvaje, la locomotora número tres, bajo la supervisión de los tecnosacerdotes. Este rebelde es mi favorito de toda la línea de carga. Cada par de años se vuelve loco: su caldera se incendia y empieza a escupir vapor a los técnicos. ¿A que no sabe a quién llaman para arreglarlo entonces? ¡A los infernus, a quién si no! Y cuando ya he terminado las tareas más peligrosas, entonces es cuando aparecen los cabezones de hierro. Pero no pasa nada, porque adoro a Salvaje».
languages.original_text: "I'm here to patch up Savage, locomotive number three, under the Tech-Priests' supervision. That old grump is my personal favourite on the entire freight line. Every couple of years, Savage gets mad: his boiler catches fire and starts spitting steam at the repairmen. Guess who they call to take care of him in these situations. The inferni, of course! And after I've done all the most dangerous work, that's when the iron brains come in. But that's all right. I love Savage."

traits.locale_text: «Estoy aquí para darle un repaso a Salvaje, la locomotora número tres. Este rebelde es mi favorito de toda la línea de carga. Cada par de años, se vuelve loco: su caldera se incendia y empieza a escupir vapor a los técnicos. ¿A que no sabe a quién llaman para arreglarlo entonces? A los infernus, a quién si no. Pero no pasa nada, porque adoro a Salvaje».

languages.text: 「技術司祭の監督のもと、機関車3号のサベージの手当てに来ました。この老いたサベージは、貨物線全体で私が一番気に入っている機関車です。サベージは数年に一度、おかしくなります。ボイラーから火が出て、修理工に向かって蒸気を吐き出すんです。そうなった時、誰がサベージの面倒を見るか分かります？もちろん、インフェルニです。そして私が一番危険な作業を全て終えたあと、鉄頭たちがやってくるんです。でも大丈夫。私はサベージを愛していますから」
languages.original_text: "I'm here to patch up Savage, locomotive number three, under the Tech-Priests' supervision. That old grump is my personal favourite on the entire freight line. Every couple of years, Savage gets mad: his boiler catches fire and starts spitting steam at the repairmen. Guess who they call to take care of him in these situations. The inferni, of course! And after I've done all the most dangerous work, that's when the iron brains come in. But that's all right. I love Savage."

traits.locale_text: 「サベージ、ロコモーション3番の手当てに来ました。このサベージは、貨物線全体で私が一番気に入っている機関車です。サベージは2、3年に一度、ボイラーから火が出て、修理工に向かって蒸気を吐き出すんです。そうなった時、誰がサベージの面倒を見てるか分かります？もちろん、インフェルニです。でも大丈夫。私はサベージを愛していますから」

languages.text: “我来打理一下萨维奇，在技术神甫的监督下，给咱们的三号火车头修补一下伤口。这个臭脾气的火车头是整条货运线路上我最喜欢的家伙。萨维奇每隔几年就会发脾气，锅炉会着火，还会朝修理工喷蒸气。发生这种情况的时候，您猜是哪些人负责照顾它？自然是控火公会的人！所有最危险的活都干完之后，我们就会来照顾一下这块铁疙瘩。不过不要紧，我很喜欢萨维奇。”
languages.original_text: "I'm here to patch up Savage, locomotive number three, under the Tech-Priests' supervision. That old grump is my personal favourite on the entire freight line. Every couple of years, Savage gets mad: his boiler catches fire and starts spitting steam at the repairmen. Guess who they call to take care of him in these situations. The inferni, of course! And after I've done all the most dangerous work, that's when the iron brains come in. But that's all right. I love Savage."

traits.locale_text: “我负责打理一下萨维奇，给咱们的三号火车头修补一下伤口。这个臭脾气的火车头，是整条货运线路上我最喜欢的家伙。萨维奇每隔几年就会发脾气，锅炉会着火，还会朝修理工喷蒸气。发生这种情况的时候，您猜是哪些人负责照顾它？自然是控火公会的人。不过不要紧，我很喜欢萨维奇。”

languages.text: "Ich bin hier, um Savage, Lokomotive 3, unter die Aufsicht der Techpriester zu stellen. Der alte Griesgram ist auf der gesamten Frachtroute mein persönlicher Favorit. Alle paar Jahre verliert Savage den Verstand. Dann fängt sein Kessel Feuer und hüllt die Mechaniker in heißen Dampf. Und jetzt ratet, wer sich dann um ihn kümmern darf. Die Inferni natürlich! Und wenn die gefährlichste Arbeit getan ist, kommen die Eisenhirne ins Spiel. Aber das ist in Ordnung. Ich liebe Savage."
languages.original_text: "I'm here to patch up Savage, locomotive number three, under the Tech-Priests' supervision. That old grump is my personal favourite on the entire freight line. Every couple of years, Savage gets mad: his boiler catches fire and starts spitting steam at the repairmen. Guess who they call to take care of him in these situations. The inferni, of course! And after I've done all the most dangerous work, that's when the iron brains come in. But that's all right. I love Savage."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin hier, um Wild zusammenzuflicken, Lokomotive Nummer drei. Dieser Streithammel ist mein persönlicher Favorit auf der gesamten Frachtroute. Alle paar Jahre dreht Wild durch: Sein Heizkessel fängt Feuer und spuckt Dampf auf die Mechaniker. Und ratet mal, wer sich dann in solchen Situationen um ihn kümmern muss? Die Inferni natürlich. Aber das ist in Ordnung. Ich mag Wild."

languages.text: « Je suis venu réparer Sauvage, la locomotive numéro trois, sous la supervision des technoprêtres. De toute la ligne de fret, ce vieux grincheux est mon engin préféré. Tous les deux ans en moyenne, il devient fou, sa chaudière prend feu et il se met à cracher des nuages de vapeur à la face des réparateurs. Et devinez un peu à qui on fait appel quand il rue dans les brancards ? Aux inferni, bien sûr ! Les crânes de fer, eux, attendent bien sagement que j'aie fini d'essuyer les plâtres pour pointer le bout de leur nez. Mais moi, ça ne me dérange pas. J'ai toujours eu un faible pour Sauvage. »
languages.original_text: "I'm here to patch up Savage, locomotive number three, under the Tech-Priests' supervision. That old grump is my personal favourite on the entire freight line. Every couple of years, Savage gets mad: his boiler catches fire and starts spitting steam at the repairmen. Guess who they call to take care of him in these situations. The inferni, of course! And after I've done all the most dangerous work, that's when the iron brains come in. But that's all right. I love Savage."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis venu réparer Sauvage, la locomotive numéro trois. De toute la ligne de fret, cette teigne est mon engin préféré. Tous les deux ans en moyenne, il devient fou, sa chaudière prend feu et il se met à cracher des nuages de vapeur à la face des réparateurs. Et devinez un peu à qui on fait appel quand il rue dans les brancards ? Aux inferni, bien sûr. Mais moi, ça ne me dérange pas. J'ai toujours eu un faible pour Sauvage. »

languages.text: "Tekno Rahiplerin gözetimi altında üç numaralı lokomotifi, yani Hoyrat'ı onarmak için buradayım. Bu huysuz ihtiyar, tüm yük hattındaki şahsi favorim. Hoyrat, birkaç yılda bir öfkelenir. Kazan dairesi alev alır ve tamircilere buhar püskürtmeye başlar. Böyle durumlarla başa çıkması için kimi çağırırlar tahmin edin... İtfacıları elbette. En tehlikeli işler hallolduktan sonra da demir kafalar geliyor işte. Bana koymuyor tabii, Hoyrat'ı pek severim."
languages.original_text: "I'm here to patch up Savage, locomotive number three, under the Tech-Priests' supervision. That old grump is my personal favourite on the entire freight line. Every couple of years, Savage gets mad: his boiler catches fire and starts spitting steam at the repairmen. Guess who they call to take care of him in these situations. The inferni, of course! And after I've done all the most dangerous work, that's when the iron brains come in. But that's all right. I love Savage."

Hoyrat, birkaç yılda bir öfkelenir. Kazan dairesi alev alır ve tamircilere buhar püskürtmeye başlar. Böyle durumlarla başa çıkması için kimi çağırırlar tahmin edin... İtfacıları elbette.
